issue.title: [CF 1200] DOT on target not working
issue.body:
I have created an icon for showing when my Immolate DOT (Warlock, destro) is active on my target. I have everything set up as I believe I should, but it fails to show when I've immolated a target. I can see it on the target's buff/debuff list, but not on my TMW icon.

Here is the string I created:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S348 ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon1 ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N74003^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user soniecat | Imported from CurseForge issue #1200 | Raw

comments.body:
That's the wrong spellID. In general, you should never use spellIDs unless there is a very specific reason to do so. In this case, there is no such reason. So, use the spell name instead.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Perfect! Thank you!! It's working now


> Posted by CurseForge user soniecat
